727432f-a.title: Queens: Metropolitan Avenue - 79th Street
727432f-a.text:
Metropolitan Avenue, north side, between 79th Street and
79th Place. From left to right are the following shops:- Bauman,
a shoemaker at No. 2243; Henry Reitenback, a backsmith at 2245;
Hirsch 's feed store at 2247, and Nos. 2249-2253 at the right (flat
roofs) owned by Hirsch. Philip and Joseph Hirsch owned all homes
in this view in 1924.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
